intro: The v-carousel component is used to display large numbers of visual content on a rotating timer.

delimiters.heading: Custom delimiters
delimiters.intro: Use any available icon as your carouselâ€™s slide delimiter.

cycle.heading: Cycle
cycle.intro: With the cycle prop you can have your slides automatically transition to the next available every 6s (default).

hide.heading: Hide controls
hide.intro: You can hide the carousel navigation controls with :show-arrows='false'.

arrows.heading: Customized arrows
arrows.intro: Arrows can be customized by using prev and next slots.

hideDelimiters.heading: Hide delimiters
hideDelimiters.intro: You can hide the bottom controls with hide-delimiters prop.
